[ library(ic) | The ECLiPSe Libraries | Reference Manual | Alphabetic Index ]

integers(?Vars)

Vars' domain is the integer numbers.
Vars
Variable or integer, or a list or submatrix of variables/integers

Calling Modes

  • integers(-)
  • integers(?)
  • integers(+)

Description

Constrain the variables to integer values. Note that this declaration is implicit when specifiying an integer interval, e.g. in Y :: 0..99.

See Also

reals / 1, suspend : integers / 1, fd : integers / 1, eplex : integers / 1, ic_kernel : integers / 1, bfs : integers / 1
